name: MisKESKUS
description:
By the time KESKUS opens, those who have played MisKESKUS will have no problem navigating in KESKUS International Estonian Centre, being built in downtown Toronto.   Come take a sneak peek, find your way around, and learn some Estonian while you play!

MisKESKUS will have you learning new things, and meeting some fun characters. Who knows, you might even spot some familiar faces!  Suitable for all ages.

Find out more about KESKUS and donate to the capital campaign.  Sign up for the monthly newsletter to keep abreast of project progress!  For full credits of the brains behind the game, go to the credits section once you open the game.  A presentation of Estonian Arts Centre, MisKESKUS is supported by Northern Birch Credit Union and Integratsiooni Sihtasutus.  Read more about the game on the KESKUS blog.
